scripts.docker:init: docker-compose run -u root --rm programmers-home bash change_volumnes_owner.sh && docker-compose run -u root --rm api-server bash -c "cd .. && bash change_volumnes_owner.sh" && docker-compose run -u root --rm client bash -c "cd .. && bash change_volumnes_owner.sh" && docker-compose run -u root --rm cli bash -c "cd .. && bash change_volumnes_owner.sh"
